name: BlastomycosisTestsForBlastomycesSpeciesAntigen
title: Blastomycosis (Tests for Blastomyces species Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Blastomyces species antigen.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: blastomyces antigen),(Exclusion Criteria: - Panel tests, interpretation tests)
